newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Foodland says third qtr sales flat.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Foodland says third qtr sales flat.

text.p: Australian and New Zealand food retailer Foodland Associated Ltd said on Thursday that total sales in the 13 weeks to April 27 were A$907.01 million compared with A$907.10 million a year ago.

Total nine month sales fell 0.6 percent to A$2.761 billion from A$2.778 billion a year ago. On a like-for-like basis, third quarter sales rose 2.9 percent to A$897.84 million and by 1.3 percent in the latest nine months to A$2.664 billion.
Foodland said total third quarter Australian sales fell to A$261.41 million from A$262.89 million and New Zealand sales rose slightly to A$645.60 million from A$644.20 milllion.

In New Zealand, the Farmers Deka division increased sales to A$178.81 million in the latest quarter from A$176.76 million a year ago, while the 57.96 percent-owned Progressive Enterprises Ltd rose to A$466.79 million from A$466.44 million.

Foodland said its total store numbers in Australia fell to 32 in the latest quarter from 33 a year ago, while in New Zealand the number of Farmers Deka stores fell to 126 from 136 and Progressive stores fell to 104 from 117.
Foodland shares were three cents lower at A$7.55 at 1.55 p.m. (0355 GMT).
